item.title: Fedora Iot, Greenboot, Systemd and of course DNS
item.description: This post is mostly as a resource for future me. But maybe it’ll come in useful to someone else. This weekend I was working on provisioning a new NAS/Media box setup after having to do a bit of hardware shuffling. Long story. I decided to try Fedora iot on a whim. Fedora iot has an interesting project called greenboot. The objective of the project is to define some checks for the state of the machine.
